aggression_01.LongName: Q01: Some of my friends think I am a hothead
aggression_01.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_02.LongName: Q02: If I have to resort to violence to protect my rights, I will.
aggression_02.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_03.LongName: Q03: When people are especially nice to me, I wonder what they want.
aggression_03.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_04.LongName: Q04: I tell my friends openly when I disagree with them.
aggression_04.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_05.LongName: Q05: I have become so mad that I have broken things.
aggression_05.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_06.LongName: Q06: I cant help getting into arguments when people disagree with me.
aggression_06.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_07.LongName: Q07: I wonder why sometimes I feel so bitter about things.
aggression_07.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_08.LongName: Q08: Once in a while, I cant control the urge to strike another person.
aggression_08.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_09.LongName: Q09: I am an even-tempered person.
aggression_09.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_10.LongName: Q10: I am suspicious of overly friendly strangers.
aggression_10.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_11.LongName: Q11: I have threatened people I know.
aggression_11.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_12.LongName: Q12: I flare up quickly but get over it quickly.
aggression_12.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_13.LongName: Q13: Given enough provocation, I may hit another person.
aggression_13.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_14.LongName: Q14: When people annoy me, I may tell them what I think of them.
aggression_14.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_15.LongName: Q15: I am sometimes eaten up with jealousy.
aggression_15.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_16.LongName: Q16: I can think of no good reason for ever hitting a person.
aggression_16.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_17.LongName: Q17: At times I feel I have gotten a raw deal out of life.
aggression_17.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_18.LongName: Q18: I have trouble controlling my temper.
aggression_18.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_19.LongName: Q19: When frustrated, I let my irritation show.
aggression_19.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_20.LongName: Q20: I sometimes feel that people are laughing at me behind my back.
aggression_20.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_21.LongName: Q21: I often find myself disagreeing with people.
aggression_21.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_22.LongName: Q22: If somebody hits me, I hit back.
aggression_22.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_23.LongName: Q23: I sometimes feel like a powder keg ready to explode.
aggression_23.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_24.LongName: Q24: Other people always seem to get the breaks.
aggression_24.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_25.LongName: Q25: There are people who pushed me so far that we came to blows.
aggression_25.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_26.LongName: Q26: I know that friends talk about me behind my back.
aggression_26.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_27.LongName: Q27: My friends say that I am somewhat argumentative.
aggression_27.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_28.LongName: Q28: Sometimes I fly off the handle for no good reason.
aggression_28.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_29.LongName: Q29: I get into fights a little more than the average person.
aggression_29.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

aggression_physical_total.Description: Buss-Perry Aggression Questionnaire - Physical aggression: sum(Q2,Q5,Q8,Q11,Q13,Q16,Q22,Q25,Q29)
